title: Attend 49th Atlanta Model Train and Railroadiana Show and Stay at Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta
text:
Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta offers convenient lodging to vendors and guests attending the 49th Atlanta Model Train and Railroadiana Show on August 8, 2015.
 ATLANTA, GA, August 01, The Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta, a leading Doraville Georgia hotel , offers convenient lodging to vendors and guests attending the 49th Atlanta Model Train and Railroadiana Show. Golden Spike Enterprises will sponsor the event on August 8 at the North Atlanta Trade Center in Norcross, Georgia. Collectors will find all types of model trains, track, and accessories related to the hobby. Railroadiana items including lanterns, signs, timetables, and other memorabilia will also be featured at the show.
"We look forward to welcoming both vendors and guests attending the Atlanta Model Train and Railroadiana Show," shares Traci Powers, Director of Sales at the Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta. "We offer affordable lodging just ten minutes from the North Atlanta Trade Center," continues Ms. Powers.
This north Atlanta hotel offers comfortable guest rooms with flat screen TV, free high speed Internet, and an in-room coffee maker. A sofa sleeper, microwave, and refrigerator are available in some rooms. Guests can cool off in the refreshing outdoor pool or enjoy a workout in the fitness center. Other property amenities include a business center and coin laundry. The onsite restaurant, Perimeter Bar & Grille, is a convenient dining option. The Conference Center has 2,900 square feet of event space. Free weekday shuttle service is provided within a three mile radius of the hotel including the Doraville MARTA Station. Downtown Atlanta and the airport are easily reached by MARTA train.
This pet friendly Doraville hotel is located near the junction of I-85 and I-285. AAA, senior, and military discounts are available. Choice Privileges members will earn points toward free hotel nights.
For information about the 49th Atlanta Model Train and Railroadiana Show on August 8, visit www.gserr.com . To book your stay at the Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta, call 770-455-3700 or visit www.northatlantahotel.com .
About Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta
The newly opened Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta is located just off I-285 at Exit 32 near Doraville and is conveniently located 14 miles from downtown Atlanta. This north Atlanta hotel was built with features and amenities to ensure you'll truly have a great stay with us including complimentary Wi-Fi, meeting and convention space, seasonal outdoor pool and pet-friendly lodging. Guests will enjoy their stay at Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta by Choice Hotels. The property participates in the Choice Privileges rewards program.
For more information visit www.northatlantahotel.com
